fields.headline: Science Weekly podcast: Time Reborn and King Tut's mummy
fields.bodyText: This week on the podcast Alok Jha meets science writer Jo Marchant to discuss her book The Shadow King: The Bizarre Afterlife of King Tut's Mummy. Also on the show, Guardian science correspondent Ian Sample asks theoretical physicist Lee Smolin about his Darwinian take on the cosmos in his latest book Time Reborn: From the Crisis in Physics to the Future of the Universe.
